00047     template<typename T, Integer _lo=0, Integer _hi=-1> class Set :
00048                 public std::set<T>, public Aggregate
00049     {
00050     public:
00051 
00052         typedef typename std::set<T>::size_type size_type;
00053         typedef typename std::set<T>::iterator iterator;
00054         typedef typename std::set<T>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00055         typedef typename std::set<T>::reverse_iterator reverse_iterator;
00056         typedef typename std::set<T>::const_reverse_iterator
00057         const_reverse_iterator;

00059         Set(bool unset=false) :
00060                 Aggregate(unset)

00064         Set(const T value[], Integer count) throw(std::range_error)
00065         {
00066             for (Integer i=0; i<count; ++i)
00067                 insert(value[i]);
00068 
00069             if (Integer(std::set<T>::size())<_lo)
00070             {
00071                 std::set<T>::clear();
00072                 throw std::range_error("Set : array not big enough");
00073             }
00074             if (_hi>0)
00075                 if (Integer(std::set<T>::size())>=_hi)
00076                 {
00077                     std::set<T>::clear();
00078                     throw std::range_error("Set size is not big enough for the array");
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082         Set(const std::vector<T>& value) throw(std::range_error)
00083         {
00084             if (Integer(std::set<T>::size())<_lo)
00085             {
00086                 std::set<T>::clear();
00087                 throw std::range_error("Set : vector not big enough");
00088             }
00089             if (_hi>0)
00090                 if (Integer(std::set<T>::size())>=_hi)
00091                 {
00092                     std::set<T>::clear();
00093                     throw std::range_error("Set size is not big enough for the vector");
00094                 }
00095 
00096             for (unsigned i=0;i<value.size();++i)
00097                 insert(value[i]);
00098         }
00099 
00100 #ifndef GLIBCXX_HAS_DEFECTS
00101         Set(const std::list<T>& value) throw(std::range_error)
00102         {
00103             if (Integer(std::set<T>::size())<_lo)
00104             {
00105                 std::set<T>::clear();
00106                 throw std::range_error("Set : list not big enough");
00107             }
00108             if (_hi>0)
00109                 if (Integer(std::set<T>::size())>=_hi)
00110                 {
00111                     std::set<T>::clear();
00112                     throw std::range_error("Set size is not big enough for the list");
00113                 }
00114 
00115             std::copy(value.begin(),value.end(),this->begin());
00116         }

00118         virtual ~Set()
00119         {
00120         }
00121 
00122         virtual void insert(const T& _val = getUnset(T())) throw(std::out_of_range)
00123         {
00124             setUnset(false);
00125             std::set<T>::insert(_val);
00126             if (_hi>0)
00127                 if (Integer(std::set<T>::size())>_hi)
00128                 {
00129                     std::set<T>::erase(_val);
00130                     throw std::out_of_range("Set is full");
00131                 }
00132         }
00133 
00134         virtual void erase(iterator &it)
00135         {
00136             std::set<T>::erase(it);

00138 
00139         virtual size_type erase(const T &value)
00140         {
00141             return std::set<T>::erase(value);
00142         }

00144         virtual inline Integer getUpperBound()
00145         {
00146             if (_hi>0)
00147                 return _hi;
00148             else
00149                 return getUnset(_hi);
00150         }
00151         virtual inline Integer getLowerBound()
00152         {
00153             return _lo;
00154         }

00157         {
00158             this->setUnset(other.isUnset());

00160             return *this;

00168     template<typename T, Integer _lo, Integer _hi> inline Set<T,_lo,_hi> &getUnset(Set<T,_lo,_hi>)
